# @aitofy/browser-profiles

> Self-hosted anti-detect browser profiles. The open-source alternative to AdsPower & Multilogin.

## What is this?

Like n8n for automation or Affine for notes, this is AdsPower for developers â€” self-hosted, open-source, and privacy-first. A TypeScript/JavaScript library for managing anti-detect browser profiles.

## Why Self-Hosted?

- Data stays on your machine (no cloud dependency)
- Zero telemetry, zero tracking
- Free forever (no subscriptions)
- Full control over your profiles

## Key Features

- Self-hosted profile storage (data stays local)
- 95% anti-detect score (WebRTC, Canvas, Audio protection)
- Auto timezone detection from proxy IP
- Proxy support with authentication (HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS5)
- Puppeteer and Playwright integration
- Zero config, works out of the box
- **NEW: Simplified imports** - all functions from one entry point

## Installation

```bash
# Recommended: rebrowser-puppeteer-core (better anti-detect!)
npm install @aitofy/browser-profiles rebrowser-puppeteer-core

# Or standard puppeteer
npm install @aitofy/browser-profiles puppeteer-core
```

## Anti-Detect Status

- browserleaks.com: 100% passed
- pixelscan.net: 100% passed
- browserscan.net: 95% (Bot Control -5%, Puppeteer limitation)
- creepjs: 85% passed

Note: 95% is the best achievable with Puppeteer/Playwright. 100% requires modified Chromium.

## CLI Tool

Install globally: npm install -g @aitofy/browser-profiles

Commands:
- browser-profiles list - List all profiles
- browser-profiles create <name> - Create new profile
- browser-profiles open <id> - Open browser with profile
- browser-profiles launch - Quick launch with random fingerprint
- browser-profiles info <id> - Show profile details
- browser-profiles delete <id> - Delete profile
- browser-profiles path - Show storage path

## Quick Examples

### Quick launch (simplest)

```typescript
import { quickLaunch } from '@aitofy/browser-profiles';

const { page, close } = await quickLaunch({
  proxy: { type: 'http', host: 'proxy.example.com', port: 8080 },
});

await page.goto('https://whoer.net');
await close();
```

### Temporary session with random fingerprint

```typescript
import { createSession } from '@aitofy/browser-profiles';

const session = await createSession({
  randomFingerprint: true,
  proxy: { type: 'http', host: 'proxy.com', port: 8080 },
});

await session.page.goto('https://example.com');
await session.close();
```

### Apply patches to existing page

```typescript
import { patchPage } from '@aitofy/browser-profiles';

await patchPage(existingPage, {
  webdriver: true,
  plugins: true,
  webrtc: true,
  fingerprint: { platform: 'Win32' },
});
```

### Generate fingerprints

```typescript
import { generateFingerprint, getFingerprintScripts } from '@aitofy/browser-profiles';

const fp = generateFingerprint({
  platform: 'macos',
  gpu: 'apple',
  language: 'ja-JP',
});

const scripts = getFingerprintScripts(fp);
await page.evaluateOnNewDocument(scripts);
```

### Profile management

```typescript
import { BrowserProfiles, withPuppeteer } from '@aitofy/browser-profiles';

const profiles = new BrowserProfiles();

const profile = await profiles.create({
  name: 'My Account',
  proxy: { type: 'http', host: 'proxy.example.com', port: 8080 },
});

const { page, close } = await withPuppeteer({ profile: profile.id });
await page.goto('https://example.com');
await close();
```

## API Summary

### Main Functions (import from '@aitofy/browser-profiles')

- `quickLaunch({ proxy, timezone })` - Quick launch without saved profile
- `createSession({ randomFingerprint })` - Temporary session with random fingerprint
- `patchPage(page, options)` - Apply anti-detect patches to existing page
- `generateFingerprint(options)` - Generate browser fingerprint on-demand
- `getFingerprintScripts(fingerprint)` - Get injection scripts for fingerprint
- `withPuppeteer({ profile })` - Launch profile and connect Puppeteer
- `launchChromeStandalone(options)` - Launch Chrome without profile management

### BrowserProfiles class

- `create(config)` - Create new profile
- `launch(id)` - Launch browser for profile
- `list()` - List all profiles
- `get(id)` - Get profile by ID
- `update(id, updates)` - Update profile
- `delete(id)` - Delete profile

### Playwright integration

- `withPlaywright({ profile })` - Launch profile and connect Playwright

### ExTower client

- `createProfile(options)` - Create ExTower profile
- `launchBrowser(userId)` - Launch and get WebSocket URL
- `listProfiles()` - List all profiles
- `deleteProfile(userId)` - Delete profile

## Use Cases

1. **Multi-account management** - Run multiple social media or e-commerce accounts
2. **Web scraping** - Avoid IP bans with rotating proxies and fingerprints
3. **Testing** - Test websites with different browser configurations
4. **Automation** - Automate tasks across multiple isolated browser sessions
